title: IBM Layoff: Check Who Will Suffer the Brunt
text:
IBM announces major layoffs, affecting thousands of employees in the US.The Cloud Classic division, including SoftLayer, faces the biggest job cuts.Other impacted units include consulting, sales, IT, and cloud infrastructure.Layoffs hit key locations like New York, North Carolina, Texas, and California.IBM shifts hiring focus to India, with more job openings there than in the US.A new return-to-office policy adds to employees' concerns amid restructuring.Read More Stories .Join our WhatsApp Channel to get the latest news, exclusives and videos on WhatsApp
